title: Modern web 2.0 serif font :-)
content:
Guys,  
I need your help. I tried to slove this question on my own but I didn’t come to definite conclusion. I have been looking for a font that goes with modern typographic trends in webdesign BUT it’s not sans-serif. It has to be clean, non-traditionalm, web 2.0 :D serif font.

I really love [**Morgan Avec**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040446/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=15), Precious and basically this kind of serif fonts, but I was wondering if you know some alternatives. It doesn’t have to be exactly the same style - just something display / web friendly and of course good lookin’.

Thanks a lot!

gonee

 [‹ Travel Iconography](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040446/http:/typophile.com/node/49925 "Go to previous forum topic") [What typefaces are this two ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040446/http:/typophile.com/node/49906 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gonee

comments.content: Soho MT, FB Dispatch, City from Berthold
